function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of privacy in data tracking and monitoring","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, potential for misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection laws, anonymize data, and obtain consent for data collection","Technologies":"Encryption, anonymization techniques, consent management tools","People":"Citizens and residents","Owner":"Government, tech companies"},{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases through contact tracing and monitoring","Impact":"Unintended transmission of disease, stigmatization of individuals","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to privacy regulations, ethical use of technology, and transparent communication with the public","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, data analysis tools, ethical AI","People":"General public, individuals being monitored","Owner":"Health authorities, government, tech companies"},{"Description":"Misinformation and discrimination in data activism","Impact":"Spread of false information, exacerbation of social and environmental injustices","Mitigation":"Fact-checking initiatives, transparency in data collection, and community engagement","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, fact-checking algorithms, community platforms","People":"Communities, marginalized groups","Owner":"NGOs, community organizations, social media platforms"}]}
